divs: Sighting DetailsMy 3 year old grandson & I were pulling into the San Diego Safari Park, & I noticed the hot air balloon they use for guests to go up & get a good view of the park. I rolled down my window of the car to get a good, clear shot of it, on this warm, slight breezy day, about 74-76 degrees, with a few, wispy clouds. I was so focused on the balloon, I really didn't notice the 2 different colored lights on the right side of the balloon, until I got home & looked at the pictures I took of the day! WHAT ARE THEY?
Summary: didn't see them, until I saw the picture I took of the hot air balloon!!
